summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources; authorizing an agreement with the United States Department of Health, Education and Welfare providing financial assistance for an Upward Bound Project designed to generate skills and motivation necessary for success in education beyond high school for enrollees from low-income backgrounds who have inadequate secondary preparation, establishing certain positions and continuing one temporary position of Program Planner within the Department of Human Resources in connection therewith, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
committee: Human Resources and Operations and Finance
